snippet: The N.C.A.A.’s annual convention in Washington is debating how to treat the young athletes driving what has become a multibillion-dollar industry.
abstract: NCAA annual convention is held in Washington, DC, amid calls for change in what has become multibillion-dollar industry; questions of how to treat student football and basketball players as well what schools should do with money generated by sports programs dominate discussion.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s annual convention in Washington is debating how to treat the young athletes driving what has become a multibillion-dollar industry.

headline.main: Visions of New Era in College Sports Converge at N.C.A.A. Convention
headline.print_headline: Visions of New Era in College Sports Converge at N.C.A.A. Convention
